response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and bring substantial value to your business. Given its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects my confidence in the product's ability to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 9500}
